Title: Relates to reciprocity between the state and New York city for businesses that are certified as minority and women-owned business enterprises
Summary: Authorizes the director of the division of minority and women's business development and the mayor of the city of New York to enter into a memorandum of understanding to allow reciprocity between the state and New York City for businesses that are certified as minority and women-owned business enterprises.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to reciprocal minority and women-owned business enterprise certification
